original_text: The man that wandereth out of the way of understanding shall remain in the congregation of the dead.
korean_text: 명철의 길을 떠난 사람은 사망의 회중에 거하리라

sentences.original_text: The man that wandereth out of way of understanding
shall remain in the congregation of the dead
sentences.korean_translation: 죽은 자들의 모임에 머물게 될 것이다
